article:
Jenny and Laura are walking to the clothes store.They want to  _  new clothes.Jane has twenty dollars and Laura has twenty dollars, _ .
Now Jane and Laura are in the  _ .Jane says,"Laura!Look at the skirt!Isn't it beautiful?I want that skirt, _  it's twenty-five dollars."
Laura says,"What are you talking  _ ?This is not a nice skirt!It is just terrible!I don't even want to see this skirt."
"OK,OK..."Jane  _  sadly .
Then Laura says,"Jane!Look at this  _ !It is beautiful!I want it.Oh,but look at the  _ . It is too high for me."
Jane says,"What are you talking about?It's not a nice sweater!It is  _  terrible! I don't even want to see it."
Now Jane is sad,and Laura is sad,too. They are walking home.They  _  no new clothes,but they know that next time they should respect others' opinions .
